title: Hi im a argentinian boy
body:
Hi guys, im a argentinian boy, i used to play in this account 3 years ago, in NA, and when it have free transfer to OCE i just transfer ( 3 years ago) and now i need this account, could i  get a free transfer to LAS? i dont have credit cards to buy RP, and my local cards cant use it, and dont have any manual charge.

Sorry for my bad english, can someone help me? i really need the transfer, and i cant play in OCE, im many kilometres away ( argentina ) and i just play a game today and all the time with 420 ms.

Can someone help me pls, can i get a free transfer? i cant buy rp, someone help me please!!!!!!!!!!

thanks you and sorry for my bad english, i just learned it in school

replies.body: troll or serious? That is the question.
It's would be free once you've paid the transfer fee.
Did noone realise this is a troll post?

I don't have money for rp myself, Maybe ask riot...
Probably use the oce service if there is one, there is likely more infrastructure here (more giving a fuck)
Shouldn't have transferred if you aren't from the OCE region. if you got the free skin, why would they send your account to LAS for free?
Im from argentina i dont have any way to buy rp, someone help me please, i only want the transfer to LAS
